Today, Gower is lighting up with clean 6 ft @12s WSW swell and a moderate 15 mph SW wind. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are prime spots, working well throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 7 ft @8s WSW with fresh 22 mph SSW winds, making it poor across the board. The day after, similar 7 ft @9s WSW swell continues with 19 mph SSE winds, keeping it in the poor category. Best: today.
